text: Antawn André Patton (born February 1, 1975), better known by his stage name Big Boi, is an American rapper and record producer. He grew up in Savannah, Georgia. He is a former member of the hip hop duo Outkast with fellow rapper André 3000. They have won six Grammys. Big Boi's first album Sir Lucious Left Foot: The Son of Chico Dusty reached number three on the Billboard 200. Big Boi is married to Sherlita Patton. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== Big Boi released 3 studio albums: Year Album 2010 Sir Lucious Left Foot: The Son of Chico Dusty 2012 Vicious Lies and Dangerous Rumors 2017 Boomiverse ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Big Boi at AllMusic Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century American rappers Category:American Christians Category:African-American rappers Category:African-American singers Category:American record producers Category:American hip hop musicians Category:Libertarians Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:People from Savannah, Georgia Category:Rappers from Atlanta
title: Big Boi
